thread.title: Veteran New York Lawmaker John DeFrancisco Files Paperwork for Governor Race

author: Mike Vilensky
title: Veteran New York Lawmaker John DeFrancisco Files Paperwork for Governor Race

organizations.name: files paperwork for governor race new york senate

text:
New York Senate Deputy Majority Leader John DeFrancisco, a veteran Syracuse-area legislator, on Monday filed paperwork with the state elections board for a gubernatorial campaign committee.
Mr. DeFrancisco, a 71-year-old Republican, has an event scheduled for Tuesday where he is expected to formally announce his candidacy. A spokesman said the senator will make his plans clear there.
